resources.string: BT Notifier requires access to notifications. When the notification settings will open, select BT Notifier checkbox and confirm. Then hit the back button.
This app allows you to proxy the notifications with other devices. Just enable the notification sharing for BT Notifier after pressing "Got it" and pair the Bluetooth with the specific device.
Bluetooth is not available on this device
App requires Bluetooth to be enabled
Now select BT Notifier checkbox and confirm. Then hit the back button.
Set the minimum notification priority from which the app will share notification
This app requires access to the notification to be enabled
Please pair your device to a computer
Please enable the switch to relaunch the server.
